dt-option.name: searchPanes.i18n.loadMessage
dt-option.summary: Add internationalisation to the message shown when the panes are loading

type.description: The `-init searchPanes.i18n.loadMessage` is displayed to the user in the SearchPanes container when the panes are loading and have not yet been displayed. This is typically only seen for large data sets or when using server-side processing.

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchPanes.i18n.loadMessage`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchPanes regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchPanes`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchPanes.i18n.loadMessage` for full details of this option.
